🎨 How to Use the Theme Manager
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　
───────────────────

- Command Menu: StickyPlainPad > Theme Manager  
  or click the gear icon in the theme selection window to open the Theme Manager.  
  Shortcut: ⌘ + ⇧ + T

- Click the [+] button to add a new theme:
  - 🎞️ Preview: See how the theme looks in real time.
  - 🏷️ Theme Name: Enter a name for the theme.
  - 🎨 Color Settings: Set background and text colors.
  - 🅰️ Font Selection: Choose from all system-installed fonts.

───────────────────

🔤 How to Change Font Size
───────────────────

- In each memo window, use a pinch gesture on the trackpad,  
- or press ⌘ + [+] / ⌘ + [-] to increase or decrease the font size.

───────────────────

📒 Memo Sticker User Guide
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　
────────────────────────────

🔹 Header Toolbar Icons

1. 🔲 Close (square icon on top-left)
   - Closes the current memo window.
   - Shortcut: ⌘ + W

2. 📌 Always on top (pin icon on top-right)
   - Keeps the memo window always visible, even when switching to another app.

3. 🎨 Change theme (palette icon on top-right)
   - Changes the theme of the current memo.
   - Custom themes can be managed in the [Theme Manager].

4. ↕️ Maximize / Restore (arrow icon on top-right)
   - Expands the window to full size or restores it to the previous size.

5. 🪟 Shrink to header only (window icon on top-right)
   - Minimizes the memo window to show only the header.

────────────────────────────

🔹 Window Adjustment and Movement

- 📐 Resize by dragging the edges
  - Adjust the window size precisely by dragging its edges.

- 🖱️ Move window by dragging the header
  - Drag the header to move the memo window to a new location.

- 🔍 Adjust font size
  - Use pinch gestures on the trackpad,
  - or press ⌘ + [+] / ⌘ + [-] to increase or decrease font size.

📝 What is the StickyPlainPad
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　
───────────────────

StickyPlainPad is a simple memo app where you can freely type plain text  
and keep it on screen like a sticky note for quick reference.

Typed text is automatically saved.  
You can resize the sticky, move it anywhere you like,  
and 📌 pin it to always stay on top of other windows.

───────────────────

🔹 Command Menu Usage

- File > New Memo           ⌘ + N  
  → Creates a new memo.

- File > Load from Text File…     ⌘ + L  
  → Loads a memo from a text file.

- File > Save as Text File…       ⌘ + S  
  → Saves the current memo as a text file.

- File > Print                     ⌘ + P  
  → Prints the current memo.

- Edit Menu  
  → Includes undo/redo, copy/paste,  
    emoji input, and find/replace (⌘ + F).

───────────────────

🔹 Memo List Manager

- [+] Click the plus icon to add a new memo  
  → Adds a new memo to the list.

- Right-click on a memo item  
  → Deletes the selected memo.

- Use the search bar at the top  
  → Quickly searches through all memos.
